Message_TemplateObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Message_TemplateObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Message_TemplateObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Used to determine message template to add or edit translations

User_LanguageObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

User_LanguageObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

User_LanguageObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Message_Template_Translation_Data.description: EC used to show user language returned in WS

Email_Translation_Data.description: Returns the name of the sender in the target language you selected.
Returns the subject of the email in the target language you selected.
Returns the body of the email in the target language you selected.

Notification_Configuration_Translation_D.description: Returns translation data for the email aspect of the message template.

Mobile_Notification_Translation_Data.description: Returns the content of the push notification in the target language you selected.

Notification_Configuration_Translation_D.description: Returns translation data for the mobile notification aspect of the message template.

Message_Template_Translation_Data.description: Contains both the email and mobile notification translation data for web services

description: Contains translation values for email and push
